listitem.para: HELP has two forms: with and without a keyword input. When no keyword is given, &PRODUCTNAME; opens the &PRODUCTNAME; manual to the table of contents. When a keyword is given, &PRODUCTNAME; searches the &PRODUCTNAME; manual for the section on keyword. You may enter the full keyword or a partial keyword.
